Thank you!

Lori Toepfer

post_text:
When school checkout ends next Wednesday, May 13th it will have been 38 school days since we last met in-person together.

In that timespan, I think we are all a little more cognizant of teachers and the many hats they wear. Teachers as well as our other service providers have gone above and beyond expectations to try and get our students to continue with their learning. From printing off packets to Zoom meetings to late night phone calls and messages from students. They converted their teaching on a whim and couldn’t have done it without the help of many different people. Girls on the Run of Nebraska has canceled all end-of-season GOTR 5Ks this spring due to the spread of COVID-19, also known as Coronavirus.

Your local GOTR team will continue to meet as usual in accordance with school and district policies until further notice.

The best prevention measures all of us can take is proper hand washing and for our girls and volunteers to stay home and not attend school or practice if they feel ill.
